Loading Symbols

A collection of customizable loading symbols from SpinKit

Search Delete Save Add to Cart
  • Eat
  • Sleep
  • Eat
  • Eat
  • Eat
Settings Profile Account

Loading Symbol Directive

Loading symbols can be created using the ba-spin-kit directive.

The loader attribute defines which loading symbol to display. Find the complete list of available names below.

Loading Symbol Names

  • rotating-plane
  • double-bounce
  • pulse
  • folding-cube
  • chasing-dots
  • circle
  • wave
  • cube-grid
  • three-bounce
  • fading-circle
  • solid-circle

Loading Symbol Colors

The color of the loading symbol can be customized by simply adding the desired class.

  • Primary color
  • Secondary color
  • Success color
  • Info color
  • Warning color
  • Alert color
  • Dark color

Loading Symbol Sizes

The size of the loading symbol can be customized by simply adding the desired class.

  • Tiny
  • Small
  • Medium
  • Large

Show/Hide Symbols

The loading symbols can be dynamically displayed using the ng-show and ng-hide classes.

Search Search
Search Search
